Career Objective
My goal is to put forth my knowledge of Civil Engineering which I achieved during my
studies and working for various organizations. If given chance I will create a niche for
myself  by hard working with utmost dedication,  responsibilities and prove myself in
demanding situation. My goal is to put forth knowledge of my field in whatever work is
assigned to me.
Professional   Details  
I have 4+ years of professional experience  in preparation of structural arrangement 
2D drawings in AUTO CAD different projects, such as Coal Washery Buildings, Steel 
Silos, Packing Plants area, Storage Yards, Platforms, Sheds, Conveyers, 
Equipment/Pipe support details. Fabrication details drawings for Washery building, 
Structural steel silo, Storage yards/Warehouses High rise buildings  miscellaneous 
structures including Material take off for various projects.
Education Qualifications  :-   
10th passed from C.B.S.E. Delhi Board in year 2008.  .
Technical Qualifications :-

Mayur Vihar Phase-1 in year 2010. 
Four year diploma in civil engineering from G.B. Pant Polytechnic Okhla Delhi
110019 in year 2015.  
Page 1 of 4Om Prakash (+91-9015972084)                                                
omprakashgautam10@gmail.com
Technical Strength / Skills
Detail engineering for process structure, pipe-rack and equipment foundations. 
Details of multistoried RCC building, RCC dyke wall, machine foundation and
water-retaining structures etc.
Foundation details and design Underground structures.
International codes and standards 
Structural detailing of RCC and steel structure.
Responsibility
Detailed  construction  drawings  of  the  structural  members,  which  includes
connection details, and other aspects related to steel structures.
Coordinating with engineering team and other discipline for engineering Inputs.
Engineering co-ordination with other departments.
Preparation of quantity estimation, review of vender and design drawing.
Preparation of specification and standards for civil and structural work.
Apply the detailing and design standards, drafting practices and procedures.
Software Proficiency
 Auto cad  (Civil)
Basic Computer Knowledge
MS Word
